3: I must give you credits for making it all the way here, heroes of the revelation.
And in front of you is Golden Jegan, one of the four Demon Generals.
The last two guys had unusual names, but yours is just way too weird.
You are no one to criticize me! Look at what you are wearing!
Golden Jegan pointed to Lee and Karenina. Their so-called 'Coating' looked completely out of place.
You heroes never change. The last generation also looked like clowns. Isn't it common sense to wear something formal and proper before fighting someone?

2: Were you there in the last war?
4: But we don't have anything else to wear.

3: Of course. I was the only Demon General who fought alongside His Majesty.
Oh c'mon. You heroes are way too wild.
A nice outfit would be nice before a Boss fight, but people often end up with a strange combination because they want best stats and skills.
For example, wearing only one helmet and a gigantic sword because of load capacity...
Hmm... Can't fault them if it's for stats.
I know right? You can't beat the enemy without stats.
Whatever... We have more important things to ask. Um, can I call you Demon General Golden Jegan?
Oh, you are a polite one. You can call me anything. Anyway, what do you want?
The Goddess' artifact... I saw this day coming ever since this castle was built.
But I, Golden Jegan, will never let anyone take the artifact easily, let alone the heroes of revelation!
You are our eternal enemies!
Who is Liv...?
It's a girl with pink hair. Like these two, she is probably wearing something light.
Pink... And strange outfit. I see. So you are looking for her.
Do you know anything? She's our friend...
She may also be a hero of the revelation, but she's our Holy Maiden! I will never tell you anything about her!
Holy Maiden!?
Roarrrr!
Golden Jegan's attitude suddenly changed. His body started to expand, as if it was going to fill the entire space.
Wait! I really don't want to resolve this with violence!
Just let your fist do the talking!
Lucia wanted to continue the negotiation, but Karenina just charged in.
Golden Jegan's body suddenly expanded again, transforming the nearby space into a new maze with Demon monsters inside.
He had escaped to somewhere deep inside the maze.
Interesting. I'll crush you all into pieces!
